name: Balloon Journey
description:
Click on the button in the lower right corner, for fullscreen

Hop in and take a hot air baloon journey trough all seasons. Press space to rise the hot air balloon ,  release it to let the balloon sink

I made this game  for the 254th Weekly Game Jam. 

I made everything but the music  myself. I used Unity and Blender.

Music is from https://www.zapsplat.com
